AssessmentQuestionVersion.name: AssessmentQuestionVersion
AssessmentQuestionVersion.description: Stores the question versions for the assessment questions.

ActivationDateTime.description: The date when the assessment question version was set to active.

AdditionalInformation.description: The additional details for an UI element, such as the disclosure text.

AssessmentQuestionId.description: Required. The ID of the assessment question associated with this record.

AssessmentQuestionSourceDocId.description: The ID of the assessment question source document that's associated with the assessment question version.

DataType.description: The data type of the assessment question associated with this record.

DeactivationDateTime.description: The date when the assessment question version was set to inactive.

Description.description: The description for the assessment question. This text is not rendered on the assessment.

DisplayTextCategory.description: Specifies the category of the display text when the data type is Text Block.

HelpText.description: The text that's added as an infobubble in the UI element related to the assessment question.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the current version of the assessment question is set to active (true) or not (false).

IsOptionSourceResponseValue.description: Indicates whether the response value source for an assessment question is configured as custom or SObject in the OmniStudio designer (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of the assessment question version record.

QuestionCreationType.description: Specifies how the assessment question is created from the assessment question source document.

QuestionText.description: Required. The assessment question text. Holds the label for the assessment question that appears on the assessment.

ResponseValues.description: Specifies the values to be defined in the picklist, multiselect picklist, or radio buttons.

Status.description: The status of the assessment question version.
